com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka

Class KafkaConsumerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.KafkaConsumerFactory

  • public class KafkaConsumerFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating and managing KafkaConsumer instances.

    The KafkaConsumer implementation will be determined by the configuration used to create it.

    The resultant KafkaConsumer will have its lifecycle managed by the Environment and will have HealthChecks installed to monitor its status.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder<T>
      A Builder for building a configured KafkaConsumer.

      • processWith

        public <T> KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder<T> processWith(kafka.serializer.Decoder<T> decoder,
                                                           StreamProcessor<T> processor)
        Prepares a KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder for a given Decoder and StreamProcessor.

        The decoder instance is used to decode Messages in the stream before being passed to the processor.

        Parameters:
        decoder - the Decoder instance to decode messages with
        processor - a StreamProcessor to process the message stream
        Returns:
        a KafkaConsumerFactory.KafkaConsumerBuilder to build a KafkaConsumer for the given processor and decoder.
